interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: VOFEL Jelly Masks for Facials Mask Powder for Moisturizing Anti Aging Jelly Face Mask Peel Off 9 Pcs
Review Date: 2022/06/24
Store: VOFEL
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'VOFEL', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Scent': 'Vanilla,Lemon', 'Skin Type': 'All, Oily, Sensitive', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 3.46 x 1.46 inches; 5.86 Ounces', 'UPC': '770456407264'}
Review Text: This was not my first time using a jelly mask and I followed mixing instructions as usual, so I have no clue why the mask ended up as it did. I put everything that was in the bowl onto my face...was going to wait the minimum 20 minutes before removing, however, the mask was already a dried, powdery clay-looking mess before the time was up. There was no peeling off, and I was barely able to rinse it off...was very hard, and looked like I was taking paint chips off my face! I used the lemon mask, which was the only one that was a whitening mask...I wonder though, since it definitely isn't going to whiten after just one mask, do I have to keep buying this set just to get the lemon one? Doesn't seem worth it. On the bright side, it did make my face feel soft after the irritation and annoyance of removing the mask...but, I can get the same results elsewhere, so definitely won't order again!
Review Title: Very disappointed
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Eyebrow Stencils & Eyebrow Pencil, 10 Styles of Eyebrow Shaper, Reusable Eyebrow Template with Dark Brown Dual-Ended Pencil & Eyebrow Razor, 3 Minutes Makeup, Suitable For All Face Shape
VIAMAZ
{'Brand': 'VIAMAZ', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Special Feature': 'Reusable', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable, Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 1.97 x 0.75 inches; 1.13 Ounces'}
I don't wear makeup often, and since this was something new to me I wanted to try it out. I like the variety of stencils included. It was easy to position and hold one in place. The problem was with the pencil...every time you try to color your eyebrow, the tip just rolls back into the tube after each pass over, making it annoying to have to keep holding the stencil with one hand while constantly twisting the color back out of the applicator with the other! Will probably end up giving these to my daughter, she has more patience than I do!
Not bad, but not great either!
Cell Fusion C Low pH pHarrier Mask*10sheets | Intensive weak acid care for all skin types, Korean Face Mask
Cell Fusion C
{'Item Weight': '200 Grams', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.36 x 2.36 x 3.94 inches', 'Brand': 'Cell Fusion C', 'Item Volume': '250 Milliliters', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 3.94 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RLE22305'}
This is one of the best masks I've used in a while! It was slightly bigger than some, but you can easily fold over to fit. Holes for eyes and mouth were perfect size, and fits well over the nose! No unpleasant fragrance and lots of essence. The best part is that it doesn't leave your skin feeling even 1% sticky after taking it off! Great quantity for the price as well...definitely recommend!
One of the best!
VOFEL Jelly Masks for Facials Mask Powder for Moisturizing Anti Aging Jelly Face Mask Peel Off 9 Pcs
VOFEL

profile:
**User Summary Update:**

- **Makeup Usage:** The user continues to rarely wear makeup, favoring minimalistic beauty routines.
- **Skincare Enthusiasm:** There is a notable growing interest in skincare products, reflected in a recent thoughtful review of a jelly mask that highlights a commitment to enhancing skin care without heavy makeup use.
- **Experimentation:** The user remains curious about trying new beauty products, particularly those focused on simplifying application processes, and is increasingly embracing skincare tools and masks.
- **Product Features:** While still valuing versatility in products, the user now demonstrates a heightened focus on comfort and efficacy, especially seeking non-sticky formulas that enhance the skin.
- **Frustration with Application:** The recent interaction reveals significant frustration with a specific product's performance, indicating that the user has high expectations for usability and effectiveness, reflecting a consistent critical view.
- **Intended Use:** The user maintains an inclination to share products with family members, showcasing their caring nature and potential for gifting.
- **Review Tone:** The user exhibits balanced critiques, highlighting product shortcomings and frustrations alongside any positive outcomes, maintaining a discerning and honest review approach.
- **Overall Rating Pattern:** A tendency towards moderate to low ratings has emerged, especially in response to experiences where the product fails to meet expectations, emphasizing the user's demand for reliable performance.

This updated summary emphasizes the user’s minimalist approach to beauty, evolving skincare priorities, and consistent demand for practical and effective products, tempered by recent frustrations.
